Trade/Device Name(s): BD FACSCanto system with BD FACSCanto clinical software
BD FACS Sample Prep Assistant II
Regulation Name(s): Pipetting and Diluting Station for Clinical Use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): BD FACS Sample Prep Assistant II
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD FACSCanto system with BD FACSCanto clinical software and BD FACS Sample Prep Assistant II for automated flow cytometric immunophenotyping of lymphocyte subsets
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for immunophenotyping lymphocyte subsets in clinical laboratories using the lyse no-wash sample preparation method for flow cytometry, for in vitro diagnostic use with or without BD FACS Sample Prep Assistant II
